root.para: However, the purchase of the convertible bonds is the first transaction of this nature for Martin. Certain risks associated with accounting for this instrument (for example, the identification of, and separate accounting for, the embedded derivative and use of the binomial option-pricing model) are not addressed by Martinâ€™s existing controls. Although some policies have been put in place to monitor the status of the convertible bonds, the policies have not been functioning long enough to determine their effectiveness. For these reasons, control risk is assessed as high.
